name: CraftUI
title: craftui.co
shortDescription: CraftUI, led by Braden Katz, specializes in UI/UX design and front-end development, catering to clients needing high-quality digital product designs. With over a decade of experience, Braden offers a results-driven approach to design, ensuring client satisfaction and project success. Ideal for startups and businesses looking to elevate their user experience.
pros: High job success rate on Upwork

aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Comprehensive design tool with collaboration features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular among Mac users for UI/UX design
